text:
POWr.io | San Francisco | Full Stack Dev | Full-time, onsite | https://www.powr.io/jobs

We help small businesses grow online. We're a small team with a big user base. ie Lots of opportunity to make an impact. We have never raised a VC round and we're profitable.

Javascript, Rails, Node, Backbone, React, Redux

More info: https://www.powr.io/jobs
